name: Harland and Wolff Heavy Industries Limited
goal:
Harland and Wolff is a maritime heavy engineering company with over 150 years experience in the shipbuilding, offshore oil, gas and renewable energy sectors.
Design, newbuild, repair and upgrade of vessels and oil and gas platforms
Design and manufacture of offshore modules: Power generation modules, transformer platforms, operations / accommodation platforms, minimum facility platforms etc.
Design and manufacture of offshore foundations: Universal foundation suction caisson piles, monopiles, jackets up to 10,000 tonnes, tripods/quadrapods, gravity bases etc.
Manufacture of subsea modules: PLEMs, PLETs, arches, buoyancy tanks etc.
Wave and tidal energy devices; prototype and mass production
Irish sea logistics base
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Ethical ship and oil / gas rig recycling.
Design and fabrication of innovative wave and tidal renewable energy devices.
